title: Create a Timing Decorator
description: Create a decorator that logs how long a method takes.
instructions: Create a @timed decorator that logs 'methodName took Xms' after each call.

hints.text: Use performance.now() before and after calling the original function

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to return the wrapped function
commonMistakes.consequence: Decorator doesn't work, original function is replaced with undefined
commonMistakes.correction: Always return a function from your decorator
